columns.description: StatsAPI game identifier for the contest.
columns.name: game_pk

columns.description: Ordinal inning number (1..9, extras as needed).
columns.name: inning_number

columns.description: Home runs scored by the home club in this inning.
columns.name: home_runs

columns.description: Hits recorded by the home club in this inning.
columns.name: home_hits

columns.description: Errors committed by the home club in this inning.
columns.name: home_errors

columns.description: Home runners left on base after the inning closed.
columns.name: home_left_on_base

columns.description: Runs scored by the away club in this inning.
columns.name: away_runs

columns.description: Hits recorded by the away club in this inning.
columns.name: away_hits

columns.description: Errors committed by the away club in this inning.
columns.name: away_errors

columns.description: Away runners left stranded after the inning.
columns.name: away_left_on_base

description: Inning-by-inning home/away scoring, hits, errors, and men left on base as reported by the StatsAPI GUMBO feed.
name: Raw Game Inning Results
